problem.title: Creating an online academy is hard... or was

time.title: Weeks building the platform
time.description: Choosing tools, designing pages, setting up payments. Time you could spend creating content.

content.title: Hours writing descriptions
content.description: Every course needs titles, descriptions, objectives. Repetitive manual work.

quizzes.title: Days creating exercises
quizzes.description: Thinking of questions, writing options, reviewing answers. Tedious work nobody enjoys.

solution.title: With LearnBase, AI does the heavy lifting
solution.description: Upload your videos and documents. AI generates everything: transcriptions, descriptions, exercises, and complete courses. You focus on teaching.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Drop your videos, PDFs, or presentations

process.title: AI Processes
process.description: Transcriptions, exercises, course structure. Done in minutes.

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Customize pricing, connect domain, start selling

waitlist.title: Early access
waitlist.subtitle: Be among the first to try LearnBase
waitlist.form_description: We'll notify you when we launch. Early birds get an exclusive discount.
waitlist.success_message: We'll notify you when we launch.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our platform and features.

ai.question: How does the AI analyze videos?
ai.answer: We extract audio using FFmpeg, transcribe with Whisper, then use LLMs to generate titles, descriptions, and quiz questions. Processing takes 2-5 minutes per hour of video.

domain.question: Can I use my own domain?
domain.answer: Yes. Add a CNAME record pointing to our servers. We handle SSL automatically. Takes about 5 minutes.

data.question: What happens to my data?
data.answer: Your content stays yours. We don't train AI on your videos. Data is encrypted at rest. Delete anytime.

pricing.question: What's included in each plan?
pricing.answer: All plans include AI video analysis, unlimited students and courses, and custom domain. Higher tiers get lower transaction fees and more storage.

finalCta.title: Your academy is one click away
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators already transforming knowledge into impact

features.title: What you get
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run an online academy

videoAnalysis.title: From video to course in minutes
videoAnalysis.description: Upload your content and AI generates transcriptions, titles, and descriptions automatically.

quizGeneration.title: Exercises that reinforce learning
quizGeneration.description: AI creates questions and exercises based on YOUR content. Your students learn better, with no extra work for you.

aiAgent.title: A tutor that never sleeps
aiAgent.description: Your students ask, AI answers with your knowledge. Personalized support 24/7.

whiteLabel.title: Your domain, your brand
whiteLabel.description: Your custom domain, your logo, your colors. Everything with your identity.

certificates.title: Professional certificates
certificates.description: Your students receive personalized certificates on completion. Your brand, zero effort.

payments.title: Get paid from day one
payments.description: Sell courses or subscriptions. Secure payments straight to your account.

aiSection.title: Your AI assistant that knows your students
aiSection.description: Create a personalized agent that understands your content, knows each student's progress, and can connect directly with WhatsApp to provide automated support.

knowledge.title: Knows your content
knowledge.description: The agent learns from your courses, materials, and documents to give accurate answers.

personality.title: Unique personality
personality.description: Configure how your agent speaks: tone, style, and personality that reflects your brand.

instant.title: Instant responses
instant.description: Available 24/7 to answer your students' questions in real time.

chat.title: Learnbase Assistant
chat.userMessage1: Hi, I have a question about module 3
chat.botMessage1: Sure, I'd be happy to help. Module 3 covers React fundamentals. What specific part are you confused about?
chat.botMessage2: Hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features. useState is the most basic one for managing local state.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of creators and businesses trust Learnbase for their online academies.

items.content: Learnbase completely transformed our internal training. The AI agent answers employee questions 24/7.
items.author: Maria Garcia

items.content: The WhatsApp integration was a game-changer. My students get reminders and can ask questions without leaving the app.
items.author: Carlos Rodriguez

items.content: I migrated my academy from another platform in a week. The support was exceptional and my students' experience improved significantly.
items.author: Ana Martinez

items.content: As a company, we needed a scalable solution. Learnbase allows us to manage over 5,000 employees without issues.
items.author: David Lopez

items.content: The brand customization is incredible. My academy looks exactly how I imagined it, with my domain and colors.
items.author: Laura Sanchez

items.content: The AI agent knows all my content. It's like having an assistant that never sleeps and always has the right answer.
items.author: Pedro Fernandez

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Learnbase (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the Service.
acceptance.age: You must be at least 18 years old to create an academy account. Academy owners are responsible for ensuring their students meet any age requirements they establish.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Learnbase is a B2B SaaS platform that enables businesses and individuals to create and manage online academies. Our Service includes:

features.academies: Creation and customization of online academies
features.payments: Payment processing via Stripe Connect Express

accounts.title: 3. Account Registration & Security
accounts.content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

owner.title: Academy Owner
owner.description: Full tenant management, billing responsibility, and legal compliance for students

instructor.title: Instructor
instructor.description: Course and user management within tenant boundaries

student.title: Student
student.description: Learning and course completion, governed by the academy's terms

billing.title: 4. Subscription Plans & Billing
billing.content: Learnbase offers subscription plans billed monthly via Stripe. By subscribing, you authorize us to charge your payment method on a recurring basis.
billing.renewal: Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the billing period. You may cancel at any time through your dashboard.
billing.refund: We offer a 14-day no-questions-asked refund policy for subscription payments. To request a refund, contact us at hello@uselearnbase.com within 14 days of your payment.

stripeConnect.title: 5. Course Sales & Stripe Connect
stripeConnect.content: Academy owners can connect their Stripe Express account to accept payments for courses. Learnbase acts as a facilitator and charges a platform commission based on your subscription plan.
stripeConnect.responsibility: As an academy owner using Stripe Connect, you are an independent merchant responsible for your pricing, taxes, customer service, and compliance with applicable laws.
stripeConnect.courseRefunds: Refund policies for course purchases are determined by each individual academy. Learnbase is not responsible for refunds on course purchases made through academies on our platform.

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.platform: Learnbase and its licensors own all rights, title, and interest in the Service, including all intellectual property rights (code, design, trademarks, etc.).
ip.userContent: You retain ownership of all content you create and upload to the Service (courses, videos, documents, etc.).
ip.license: By uploading content, you grant Learnbase a non-exclusive, worldwide license to host, store, and deliver your content solely for the purpose of providing the Service. This license terminates when you delete your content or account.

acceptableUse.title: 7. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these Terms. Prohibited activities include:

prohibited.illegal: Engaging in illegal activities or promoting illegal content
prohibited.copyright: Infringing on intellectual property rights (DMCA process available)
prohibited.harassment: Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or bullying
prohibited.malware: Distributing malware, spam, or phishing content
prohibited.ai: Misusing AI features to generate harmful, deceptive, or inappropriate content

ai.title: 8. AI Features
ai.content: Learnbase provides AI-powered features including video transcription, content generation, and quiz creation. These features are provided as assistance tools and are not guaranteed to be accurate.
ai.providers: AI processing is performed by third-party providers including Groq, Google (Gemini), OpenAI, and Anthropic. By using AI features, you consent to your data being processed by these providers.
ai.responsibility: You are solely responsible for reviewing, editing, and approving any AI-generated content before publishing it on your academy.

certificates.title: 9. Certificates
certificates.content: Certificates are issued upon course completion and include a unique verification code. Certificates are non-transferable and represent completion of the specific course.
certificates.permanence: Certificate records are maintained permanently to ensure verification integrity. The student's name is locked at the time of issuance and cannot be changed.

privacy.title: 10. Data & Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
privacy.dataController: For academy owners: You act as the data controller for your students' personal data. Learnbase acts as a data processor on your behalf.
privacy.dpa: A Data Processing Agreement (DPA) is available upon request for enterprise customers.

liability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
liability.warranty: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
liability.limitation: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, LEARNBASE'S TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY YOU IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.
liability.exclusions: LEARNBASE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, OR BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Learnbase, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from: (a) your violation of these Terms; (b) your content uploaded to the Service; (c) your violation of any third-party rights; (d) for academy owners, any claims related to your handling of student data.

termination.title: 13. Termination
termination.user: You may cancel your account at any time through your dashboard. Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period.
termination.platform: We may suspend or terminate your account for violation of these Terms, with notice when reasonably possible. In cases of serious violations, we may terminate immediately.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your access to the Service will be revoked. Your data will be retained according to our Privacy Policy. Certificates issued through your academy will remain verifiable.

disputes.title: 14. Dispute Resolution
disputes.law: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of New Mexico, USA, without regard to conflict of law principles.
disputes.resolution: Before filing a formal dispute, you agree to first contact us at hello@uselearnbase.com to attempt informal resolution. We will work in good faith to resolve any issues within 30 days.
disputes.arbitration: Any disputes not resolved informally shall be resolved through binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association (AAA) under its Commercial Arbitration Rules.
disputes.classAction: YOU AGREE TO RESOLVE DISPUTES ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS AND WAIVE YOUR RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT OR CLASS-WIDE ARBITRATION.

changes.title: 15. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be communicated via email or through the Service. Your continued use of the Service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: 16. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us:

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Learnbase LLC ("Learnbase", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Service.
intro.scope: This policy applies to visitors of our website, academy owners who use our platform, and students who access academies hosted on our platform.
intro.processor: For student data: Academy owners act as data controllers, and Learnbase acts as a data processor on their behalf.

direct.title: Information You Provide
direct.content: We collect information you provide directly when creating an account or using our Service:

password.label: Password
password.purpose: Authentication (stored securely hashed, never in plain text)

auto.title: Information Collected Automatically
auto.content: When you use our Service, we automatically collect certain information:
auto.session: Session duration and frequency of use
auto.referrer: How you arrived at our Service
auto.country: General geographic location (derived from IP address, not stored)

learning.title: Learning Data
learning.progress: Video watch progress and completion status

payment.title: Payment Information
payment.content: Payment processing is handled by Stripe. We store Stripe customer IDs, subscription IDs, and transaction records (amounts and status).
payment.noCards: We do not store credit card numbers or sensitive payment details. All payment data is processed securely by Stripe (PCI-DSS compliant).

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our Service
use.analytics: Analyze usage patterns and improve features

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing

providers.title: Service Providers
providers.content: We share information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf:

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose information if required by law, court order, or government request, or to protect our rights, property, or safety.

business.title: Business Transfers
business.content: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred. We will notify you of any change in ownership or use of your personal information.

sharing.noSale: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

transfers.title: 5. International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Our primary infrastructure is located in the United States. If you are accessing our Service from outside the US, your information will be transferred to and processed in the US.
transfers.scc: For users in the European Economic Area (EEA), we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission to ensure adequate protection for international data transfers.

gdpr.title: 7. Your Rights (GDPR - European Users)
gdpr.content: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have the following rights:

access.label: Right of Access
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data

erasure.label: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")

portability.label: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a machine-readable format

object.label: Right to Object
object.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

withdraw.label: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.description: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

gdpr.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at hello@uselearnbase.com. We will respond within 30 days.

ccpa.title: 8. Your Rights (CCPA - California Residents)
ccpa.content: If you are a California resident, you have the following rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act:

know.label: Right to Know
know.description: Request disclosure of what personal information we collect, use, and share

delete.label: Right to Delete
delete.description: Request deletion of your personal information

optout.label: Right to Opt-Out
optout.description: We do not sell personal information, so this right does not apply

nondiscrimination.label: Right to Non-Discrimination
nondiscrimination.description: We will not discriminate against you for exercising your privacy rights

cookies.title: 9. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.noCookies: We do not use traditional tracking cookies
cookies.localStorage: Used to store authentication tokens (JWT) for your session
cookies.sessionStorage: Used to store a temporary session ID for analytics
cookies.umami: Privacy-focused analytics that does not use cookies or collect personal data

security.title: 10. Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information:
security.passwords: Passwords are securely hashed using bcrypt
security.https: All data transmitted over HTTPS/TLS encryption
security.presigned: File access via secure presigned URLs (7-day expiry)
security.rbac: Role-based access control for data access

children.title: 11. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our platform is not directed at children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children.tenants: Academy owners are responsible for ensuring compliance with age requirements and obtaining appropriate consent for minors who access their academies.
children.contact: If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately at hello@uselearnbase.com so we can delete it.

multiTenant.title: 12. Multi-Tenant Architecture
multiTenant.content: Our platform uses a multi-tenant architecture where each academy operates independently:
multiTenant.processor: Acts as data processor for academy student data

owners.label: Academy Owners
owners.description: Act as data controllers for their students' personal data

multiTenant.review: If you are a student, please also review your academy's privacy policy for information about how they handle your data.

ai.title: 13. AI Processing Notice
ai.content: We use artificial intelligence to provide various features:
ai.transcription: Video transcription (audio is sent to Groq)
ai.generation: Course content generation (prompts sent to AI providers)
ai.providers: AI processing may involve: Groq, Google (Gemini), OpenAI (GPT-4o), and Anthropic (Claude).
ai.monitoring: AI outputs may be monitored via Langfuse for quality improvement purposes.

changes.title: 14. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Material changes will be communicated via email. Minor changes will be reflected by an updated "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 15. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:
contact.subject: For privacy-related requests, please include "Privacy Request" in your email subject line.
